WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 DEC
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 150 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-29.68S 042-52.43W, 24-16.50S 042-24.08W,
   24-24.68S 042-19.62W, 24-37.90S 042-48.57W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3626/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 DEC 18.
